summary.para: Contains editor classes. They provide the functionality for corresponding controls. Editor specific information is stored within the Persistent classes that are implemented in the namespace.
Provides API common for the XtraOpenFileDialog and XtraSaveFileDialog dialogs.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified settings.

member.param: An object that owns this dialog.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.AddExtension

summary.para: Gets or sets whether a dialog should automatically add an extension to a file name if a user omits the extension. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.AddExtension property.

member.value: true, to automatically add an extension; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.AutoUpdateFilterDescription

summary.para: Gets or sets whether a dialog with file extension filters (see ) shows filter patterns for each filter option.

member.value: true, to display complete filter names (descriptions plus filter templates); false, to display filter names only.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.CheckFileExists

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog box displays a warning if a user specifies a file name that does not exist. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.CheckFileExists property.

member.value: true, to display a warning; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.CheckPathExists

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog box displays a warning if a user specifies a path that does not exist. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.CheckPathExists property.

member.value: true, if the dialog should display a warning; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.CustomPlaces

summary.para: A collection of quick access paths to which a user can navigate. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.CustomPlaces property.

member.value: A collection of quick access locations.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.DefaultExt

summary.para: Gets or sets the default file extension (without the dot character). This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.DefaultExt property.

member.value: The default file extension.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.DefaultViewMode

summary.para: Gets or sets the initial dialog view ("Tiles", "Table", "Medium icons", etc.).

member.value: The initial dialog view.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.DereferenceLinks

summary.para: If a user selects a shortcut, this property specifies whether the dialog returns this shortcut location, or the location of a file this shortcut references. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.DereferenceLinks property.

member.value: true, if the dialog should return the parent file location; false, if the dialog should return the shortcut location.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.FileName

summary.para: Gets or sets the selected file name, or an empty string if no file was selected. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.FileName property.

member.value: The selected file name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.FileNames

summary.para: Returns an array of file names opened in the XtraOpenFileDialog. Has no effect for the XtraSaveFileDialog. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.FileNames property.

member.value: An array that contains opened files' names.

summary.para: Fires when a user presses "Save" or "Open" (depending on the current dialog type).

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.Filter

summary.para: Allows you to save or open files only of specific types. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.Filter property.

member.value: A list of allowed file extensions.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.FilterIndex

summary.para: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.FilterIndex property.

member.value: The index of the selected filter.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.InitialDirectory

summary.para: Gets or sets the location which the dialog shows upon the first launch. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.InitialDirectory.

member.value: The default dialog location.

summary.para: Resets all dialog properties to their default values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.RestoreDirectory

summary.para: If a user navigates to a different directory and closes the dialog without saving (opening) a new file, this property specifies whether this new location should be remembered. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.RestoreDirectory property.

member.value: true to restore the previous location; false to remember the new location.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.ShowHelp

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog displays the Help button. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.ShowHelp property.

member.value: true, if the dialog should display the Help button; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.SupportMultiDottedExtensions

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog supports filters with more than one dot character. This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.SupportMultiDottedExtensions property.

member.value: true, if the dialog supports file extensions with multiple dots in their names; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.FileDialogBase.ValidateNames

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog supports Win32 file names only (no angle brackets, no colons, 3-character extension, etc.). This property is identical to the standard FileDialog.ValidateNames property.

member.value: true to use Win32 file names only; otherwise, false.

summary.para: A replacement for the standard WinForms FolderBrowserDialog. Supports theming by DevExpress Skins.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.param: An IContainer descendant that owns this .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.Description

summary.para: Gets or sets the description that is displayed above the folder hierarchy. Note that dialogs with the property set to Wide do not show their descriptions.

member.value: A String value that is the description displayed above the folder hierarchy.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.DialogStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the dialog style.

member.value: A DevExpress.Utils.CommonDialogs.FolderBrowserDialogStyle enumeration value that specifies the dialog style.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder

summary.para: Gets or sets the root folder from which the navigation starts. Note that this property is in effect only when a property set to Compact, wide dialogs always start with the root "Desktop" folder.

member.value: A object that specifies the folder from which the navigation starts.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath

summary.para: Gets or sets the selected path.

member.value: A String value that specifies the selected path.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should display the "New Folder" button.

member.value: true, if the "New Folder" button is visible; otherwise, false.

summary.para: A replacement for the standard WinForms OpenFileDialog. Supports theming by DevExpress Skins.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.param: An IContainer descendant that owns this .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.CheckFileExists

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should warn a user if a file with the specified name does not exist.

member.value: true, to check file names; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.Multiselect

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not users are allowed to select multiple files in this .

member.value: true, if end-users can select multiple files; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.OpenFile

summary.para: Opens the file specified by the FileName property. The file is opened with read-only permission.

member.returns: A Stream that stores the selected read-only file.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.SafeFileName

summary.para: Returns the selected file name and extension. The returned name does not include the file path.

member.value: A String value that is the file name and extension.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.SafeFileNames

summary.para: Returns an array of file names and extensions for all the selected files in the dialog box. File names do not include paths.

member.value: A String array that contains file names and extensions.

summary.para: A replacement for the standard WinForms SaveFileDialog. Supports theming by DevExpress Skins.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.param: An IContainer descendant that owns this .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.CreatePrompt

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should ask users for the permission to create a file if the specified file does not yet exist.

member.value: true to display a message; false to automatically create a file without confirmation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.OpenFile

summary.para: Opens the user-selected file. The file is opened with read/write permissions.

member.returns: A Stream that stores the selected read/write file.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.OverwritePrompt

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should warn users when they try to save a file under an already existing name.

member.value: true to display a warning, false to overwrite old files without confirmation.
